title: Buying Cy Young, Mathewson, WaJo, & Wags Postcards
author: chipperhank44

posts.post_title: Buying Cy Young, Mathewson, WaJo, & Wags Postcards
posts.post_content:
Hey guys, I'm looking to add to my HOF postcard collection.  Not looking for team postcards, single subject preferred.  Prefer the PC to be from the player's playing days.  Appreciate any help with my collection!!

PM me with what you have and asking price.  Thanks!

- Trey
This money is burning a hole in my pocket, let me send it your way.  Also looking for Waddell, Cobb, and Speaker postcards.
